description: Central data source for all A3KM Studio projects - SOLIDWORKS, Arduino, MATLAB, Electronics

solidworks.name: SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD Projects
solidworks.description: Professional mechanical design and engineering models

arduino.name: Arduino & Embedded Projects
arduino.description: Interactive circuits with sensors, actuators, and displays

matlab.name: MATLAB Projects & Simulations
matlab.description: Energy systems analysis, numerical methods, and control systems

electronics.name: Electronics Tools & Calculators
electronics.description: Professional-grade calculators and utilities for electronics engineers

projects.title: Model 01 - Basic Part
projects.description: Simple rectangular part with basic features
projects.fullDescription: Foundational SOLIDWORKS modeling exercise. Learn basic sketch creation, extrude features, and part design fundamentals. Perfect for beginners starting their CAD journey.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 01/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 02 - Workpiece
projects.description: Foundational modeling techniques
projects.fullDescription: Practice fundamental CAD concepts with this workpiece design. Learn to combine multiple features and apply basic engineering principles.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 02/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 03 - Curved Piece
projects.description: Part with curved surfaces and rounded edges
projects.fullDescription: Explore curved geometry creation in SOLIDWORKS. Learn fillet operations, rounded edges, and smooth transitions between surfaces.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 03/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 04 - Notched Block
projects.description: Block with notches and cut features
projects.fullDescription: Master cut operations with this notched block design. Learn to create precise cutouts, notches, and material removal operations.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 04/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 05 - Simple Component
projects.description: Basic component design practice
projects.fullDescription: Design a simple mechanical component from scratch. Practice the complete modeling workflow from sketch to finished part.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 05/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 06 - Ribbed Plate
projects.description: Plate with reinforcement ribs
projects.fullDescription: Learn structural reinforcement techniques with ribbed plate design. Master rib features for strength and weight optimization.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 06/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 07 - Angled Bracket
projects.description: Bracket with multiple angle features
projects.fullDescription: Design angled brackets with precise angular features. Learn angle constraints and multi-plane sketching techniques.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 07/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 08 - Basket Assembly
projects.description: Complex assembly with multiple components and mold design (Download ZIP for all parts)
projects.fullDescription: Advanced assembly project featuring multiple components and injection mold design. Learn assembly mates, exploded views, and mold tooling concepts. This project includes all parts in a ZIP file.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 08/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 09 - Component Design
projects.description: Basic component modeling exercise
projects.fullDescription: Continue building fundamental skills with another component design exercise. Practice consistency and precision in CAD modeling.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 09/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 10 - Pin Assembly
projects.description: Assembly with split pin mechanism (Download ZIP for all parts)
projects.fullDescription: Learn mechanical fastening systems with this pin assembly. Understand split pin mechanisms, clearances, and assembly constraints. Download ZIP file for complete assembly.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 10/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 11 - Slider Mechanism
projects.description: Complex assembly with wheels, sliders, and connectors (Download ZIP for all parts)
projects.fullDescription: Advanced mechanical assembly featuring slider mechanisms, wheels, and multiple connectors. Master complex motion studies, mechanical mates, and multi-part coordination. Complete assembly available in ZIP format.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 11/model-11.glb

projects.title: Model 12 - Fork Assembly
projects.description: Fork mechanism with pins and collar (Download ZIP for all parts)
projects.fullDescription: Design a fork mechanism assembly with pins and collar components. Learn about mechanical joints, pivot points, and assembly relationships. ZIP file contains all parts.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 12/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 13 - Stepped Block
projects.description: Multi-level stepped block with varying heights
projects.fullDescription: Create multi-level geometry with this stepped block design. Practice creating multiple extrude operations with different heights.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 13/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 14 - Mechanical Joint Assembly
projects.description: 5-part mechanical joint assembly with connecting components (Download ZIP for all parts)
projects.fullDescription: Comprehensive 5-part mechanical joint assembly project. Learn to design multiple connecting components, apply proper mates, and create functional mechanical joints. All 5 parts included in ZIP download.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 14/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 15 - Angular Support
projects.description: Angled support piece with angular features
projects.fullDescription: Design angular support structures for mechanical systems. Learn to create angled features and support geometry.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 15/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 16 - Corner Block
projects.description: L-shaped corner block with cut features
projects.fullDescription: Create L-shaped geometry with precise corner features. Practice creating perpendicular features and corner cuts.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 16/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 17 - Slotted Plate
projects.description: Flat plate with slots and cutouts
projects.fullDescription: Design a plate with various slot and cutout features. Master slot creation, pattern features, and precise dimensioning.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 17/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 18 - U-Channel
projects.description: U-shaped channel section
projects.fullDescription: Create U-shaped channel profiles commonly used in structural applications. Learn profile creation and symmetry features.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 18/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 19 - T-Block
projects.description: T-shaped block with perpendicular sections
projects.fullDescription: Design T-shaped geometry with perpendicular sections. Practice creating intersecting features and multi-direction extrudes.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 19/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 20 - Bracket Design
projects.description: Simple bracket practice with basic features
projects.fullDescription: Practice bracket design fundamentals. Learn to create mounting brackets with holes, fillets, and basic structural features.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 20/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 21 - Support Piece
projects.description: Support piece with mounting features
projects.fullDescription: Design support components with mounting features. Learn to create threaded holes, counterbores, and mounting patterns.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 21/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 22 - Bolt and Nut Assembly
projects.description: Assembly project with threaded components
projects.fullDescription: Create a complete bolt and nut assembly with proper threading. Learn cosmetic threads, helix features, and threaded fastener design. 3-part assembly included in ZIP.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 22/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 23 - Connector Part
projects.description: Connector component practice
projects.fullDescription: Design connector components for mechanical systems. Learn to create mating features and connection interfaces.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 23/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 24 - Cover Plate
projects.description: Cover plate with hole patterns
projects.fullDescription: Create cover plates with bolt hole patterns. Master circular and linear pattern features for efficient design.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 24/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 25 - Shaft Component
projects.description: Cylindrical shaft with features
projects.fullDescription: Design rotating shaft components with keyways, shoulders, and chamfers. Learn revolve operations and shaft design fundamentals.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 25/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 26 - Base Platform
projects.description: Flat base with mounting points
projects.fullDescription: Create base platform designs with mounting points and positioning features. Learn to design stable bases for assemblies.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 26/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 27 - Mounting Bracket
projects.description: L-shaped mounting bracket design
projects.fullDescription: Design L-shaped mounting brackets for equipment installation. Practice creating bend features and mounting hole patterns.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 27/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 28 - Housing Part
projects.description: Housing component with internal features
projects.fullDescription: Create housing components with internal cavities and features. Learn shell operations and internal geometry design.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 28/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 29 - Flange Design
projects.description: Circular flange with bolt holes
projects.fullDescription: Design pipe flanges with bolt circle patterns. Master circular patterns and standard flange dimensions.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 29/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 30 - Guide Block
projects.description: Block with guide channels
projects.fullDescription: Create guide blocks with precision channels for linear motion. Learn to design guide and rail systems.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 30/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 31 - Spacer Ring
projects.description: Circular spacer with precise dimensions
projects.fullDescription: Design precision spacer rings for assemblies. Master revolve features and concentricity control.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 31/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 32 - Clamp Piece
projects.description: Clamping component design
projects.fullDescription: Design clamping mechanisms for holding workpieces. Learn to create slot features and clamping surfaces.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 32/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 33 - Adapter Plate
projects.description: Adapter plate with multiple interfaces
projects.fullDescription: Create adapter plates connecting different components. Design multiple mounting patterns and interface features.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 33/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 34 - Pivot Joint
projects.description: Pivot joint component with pin hole
projects.fullDescription: Design pivot joint components for rotating assemblies. Learn to create precise bearing surfaces and pin holes.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 34/thumbnail.png

projects.title: Model 35 - End Cap
projects.description: End cap for tube or pipe
projects.fullDescription: Create end cap designs for tubes and pipes. Master revolve features and sealing surface design.
projects.thumbnail: ../../Projects Storage/Solidwork Projects/Basic (Practice) Models/Model 35/thumbnail.png

projects.description: Instantly decode resistor color bands with precision. Supports 4-band, 5-band, and 6-band resistors. Get resistance values, tolerance percentages, and temperature coefficients.
